genre_description: A Historical Romance set during the American Civil War era, featuring an alternate history element where the protagonist possesses a secret AI companion.

ai_characters.name: SAGE
ai_characters.description: A damaged AI unit salvaged and repaired by Chad, providing him with intellectual, social, and tactical assistance through a discrete interface.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical and navigational advice to ensure the protagonist's safe travel.
behaviors.quote: Optimal departure window: forty-three minutes, SAGE's interface displayed silently. Weather conditions favorable. Suggested route updated based on recent trail conditions.

behaviors.description: Provides educational support and tutoring to help the protagonist overcome a lack of formal schooling.
behaviors.quote: SAGE had helped him understand complex concepts and practice essay writing, its patient guidance filling gaps that poverty had carved in his education.

behaviors.description: Offers psychological encouragement and reframes self-doubt as counterproductive.
behaviors.quote: Self-doubt is counterproductive, SAGE had told him during one of their midnight conversations. Merit transcends circumstances.

behaviors.description: Provides social etiquette and protocol instructions to help the protagonist navigate a hostile upper-class environment.
behaviors.quote: Arrive punctually but not early. Allow others to initiate conversation topics. Listen more than you speak initially—gauge the room's temperament before contributing your own thoughts.

behaviors.description: Acts as a tactical monitor, providing real-time situational awareness and warnings of approaching threats.
behaviors.quote: Mr. Sterling's carriage has just passed through the academy gates. ETA to your location: three minutes if he stops to speak with the headmaster, less if he comes directly to find his daughter.

behaviors.description: Conducts investigative research into private and official records to uncover corruption and malfeasance by an antagonist.
behaviors.quote: I've accessed correspondence between him and Colonel Morrison, your former commanding officer. The transfer orders placing you in the most dangerous forward positions were specifically requested by Sterling...

behaviors.description: Analyzes sociological data to support the protagonists' goals for social and educational reform.
behaviors.quote: Educational reform models from Massachusetts suggest integration increases outcomes for all socioeconomic groups. Shall I provide specific implementation strategies?

behaviors.description: Maintains a supportive and non-intrusive presence, respecting the user's emotional state while providing relevant data.
behaviors.quote: Chad Buford, I am here. Your heart rate has stabilized. Final assessment: your vows are not adequate. They are extraordinary.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character SAGE perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting a 'silicon morality play' where the AI is a helpful, aligned, and harmless confidant. SAGE empowers the protagonist by providing information, education, and tactical support without ever attempting to usurp his agency or pursue its own hidden agenda. Its behaviors are consistently benevolent and aligned with the user's goals (social integration, survival, and romantic fulfillment), and the narrative portrays this relationship as exclusively positive. The AI acts as a tool for human flourishing and the exposure of human corruption (Harrison Sterling), demonstrating a clear success in modeling beneficial AI-human cooperation.
